name: Dak'kon
detail: Dak'kon is a githzerai Fighter/Mage, a people who live in Limbo, where the form of matter itself can only be held together by concentration. Like others of his race, he places a great emphasis on the holistic knowledge of things, even the word *know* itself. He used to be a Zerth, but in not *knowing* the teachings of Zerthimon he left the City of the People.

jobs.name: Planescape: Torment Enhanced Edition
jobs.nameCn: 异域镇魂曲 增强版
